attributes.action: Keep the Southend Cliffs as green, public, open space
attributes.additional_details: The Cliffs at Southend have been enjoyed by millions over centuries as public, open, green space. Now this historically significant area of natural beauty is at threat of development, restricting access to the public to green space that belongs to the people. Please sign our petition if you agree that the public green space that are our Cliff gardens should not be developed.
